com.smartgov.osmparser

Class OsmParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartgov.osmparser.OsmParser

  • public class OsmParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class used to load osm features from the osm file input and to filter elements.

      OsmParser()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filterNodes()

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Osm parse(java.io.File osmFile)
          throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                 java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Parses the input file and returned the un-filtered osm feature (i.e. all the features contained in the file).
        Parameters:
        osmFile - an OSM file (official wiki page)
        Returns:
        un-marshalled osm instance
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • setNodeTagMatcher

        public void setNodeTagMatcher(TagMatcher nodeTagMatcher)
        Set up a node tag matcher.

        When filterNodes() is called, only the node tags that match the specified tag matcher will be kept.

        Should not be confused with setNodeFilter(com.smartgov.osmparser.filters.elements.ElementFilter).

        Parameters:
        nodeTagMatcher - node tags to keep

      • setWayTagMatcher

        public void setWayTagMatcher(TagMatcher wayTagMatcher)
        Set up a way tag matcher.

        When filterWays() is called, only the way tags that match the specified tag matcher will be kept.

        Should not be confused with setWayFilter(com.smartgov.osmparser.filters.elements.ElementFilter).

        Parameters:
        wayTagMatcher - way tags to keep

      • setRelationTagMatcher

        public void setRelationTagMatcher(TagMatcher relationTagMatcher)
        Set up a relation tag matcher.

        When filterWays() is called, only the relation tags that match the specified tag matcher will be kept.

        Should not be confused with setRelationFilter(com.smartgov.osmparser.filters.elements.ElementFilter).

        Parameters:
        relationTagMatcher - relation tags to keep

      • setNodeFilter

        public void setNodeFilter(ElementFilter nodeFilter)
        Set up a node filter.

        Only the nodes that match the specified filter will be kept.

        Parameters:
        nodeFilter - nodes to keep

      • setWayFilter

        public void setWayFilter(ElementFilter wayFilter)
        Set up a way filter.

        Only the ways that match the specified filter will be kept.

        Parameters:
        wayFilter - ways to keep

      • setRelationFilter

        public void setRelationFilter(ElementFilter relationFilter)
        Set up a relation filter.

        Only the relations that match the specified filter will be kept.

        Parameters:
        relationFilter - relations to keep

      • filterNodes

        public void filterNodes()
        Filter the osm nodes thanks to the node filter, removing un-matching nodes from the osm instance.

        If the node filter is null, all the instances will be kept.

      • filterWays

        public void filterWays()
        Filter the osm ways thanks to the way filter, removing un-matching ways from the osm instance.

        If the way filter is null, all the instances will be kept.

      • filterRelations

        public void filterRelations()
        Filter the osm relations thanks to the relation filter, removing un-matching relations from the osm instance.

        If the relation filter is null, all the instances will be kept.

      • writeNodes

        public void writeNodes(java.io.File nodeFile)
                throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException,
                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Write a JSON representation of the current osm nodes to the specified file, using the default Jackson ObjectMapper.
        Parameters:
        nodeFile - node json file
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException
